title: Track fault on East West Line

updates.text: 9.00am: EWL - Fault cleared. Train service resumed. Free regular bus service is still available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

[EWL] UPDATE: Due to track point fault, please add additional 10 mins of train travelling time between #Tampines and #PasirRis in both directions. Free regular bus service is available between #Tampines and #PasirRis. Normal train service is available for the rest of East West

7.00am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 10 minutes  of travelling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

[EWL] UPDATE: Train svc is available btwn #Tampines and #PasirRis. Please add 10 mins train travel time from Tampines to Pasir Ris, towards Pasir Ris due to track point fault. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris.
